thread.section_title: Test Equipment Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Test Equipment Depot | www.testequipmentdepot.com
thread.title: David Prince
thread.title_full: Test Equipment Depot reviewed by David Prince

author: David Prince
title: David Prince
text: The online specification says that Low Range is between 1 uW/cm2 and 1999 uW/cm2 so I was worried it wouldn't work for me, but when I got the meter the accompanying document stated the Low Range was actually between 1 uW/cm2 and 9999 uW/cm2. What a relief! I was able to effortlessly measure UV in the 5000 uW/cm2 range. So fix the error on your website and you may be able to make more sales : )
